response.content: In Portland, you can visit the **Jordan Schnitzer Museum of Art** at Portland State University, which is free and open to the public. Additionally, the **Portland Art Museum** offers free admission on the first Thursday of every month from 10 a.m. to 7 p.m. Enjoy your visit!
